mapper.select: select s.*, r.rvTitle,r.rvlat,r.rvlng from stamp s Join review r On s.rvNo=r.rvNo
mapper.insert: insert into stampcheck(nickname,rvno,distance) SELECT * from (select #{nickName},rvno, CALC_DISTANCE(#{lat},#{lng}, rvlat, rvlng) DISTANCE from review r join profile p on r.nickname=p.nickname) where DISTANCE < 3
insert into memberStamp select distinct nickName, rvno from stampcheck where nickName = #{nickName}
